SALESFORCE HELP

VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (Version 4.12) Release Notes

Provide your merchandisers and admins with more tools for managing your product catalog and storefront metadata with greater efficiency. Apply important security and behavior enhancements that keep your storefront secure, compliant, and running smoothly.

Upgrade to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (Version 4.12)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12) introduces several improvements and enhancements, but doesn't introduce any disruptive changes that require manual action. To make sure that your org, Experience Cloud sites, and storefronts are updated with the latest security enhancements, complete the following upgrade steps.
Product List Page: Manage Product Index Records More Efficiently
Maintain the product data used for populating results on the Product List page more easily, and deliver up-to-date content for your buyers with fewer dependencies. Optimize how B2B Commerce for Visualforce runs batch jobs for refreshing product index records, and exclude certain products from being indexed.
Admin Experience: Manage Storefront Metadata More Efficiently and Confidently
Equip your admins with better tools for managing B2B Commerce for Visualforce data. Support development and troubleshooting efforts with more context for multiple configuration cache entries. And, admins whose native language is French or German can now enjoy a more efficient experience with a localized CC Admin.
Metrics: Automatically Track Usage-Based Entitlements for B2B Commerce for Visualforce
Gain insight into your storefronts, orders, and products activity. B2B Commerce for Visualforce now reports metrics information in the Usage-based Entitlements related list, which you can find under Company Information under Setup. There’s no extra setup required to access this information.
Trust: Keep Your Storefront Secure and Functional
Keep your storefront, Experience Cloud site, and org up to date with the latest measures to protect against unauthorized access. Ensure that your storefront continues to provide a smooth, engaging, and intuitive experience for buyers.
Other Fixes in B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (Version 4.12)
Have confidence that the issues related to performance or buyer experience that you've reported are resolved appropriately. This release includes several fixes that resulted from your submitted cases.
Patch Notes for B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (Version 4.12)
Several patch releases are available for maintaining existing implementations of B2B Commerce Spring ’20 (version 4.12). Some patches contain fixes that require manual upgrade steps. Each patch release is also cumulative, and contains all the fixes from previous B2B Commerce Spring ’20 (version 4.12) patches. When you install a particular patch build, complete any required upgrade steps for all patches that precede the patch you're installing.
